snippet: Peter Piller’s two groups of pictures are pointedly parallel in juxtaposing iconographies of war and technology on the one hand and of feminine beauty and nature on the other.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews Umschlage exhibit of works by German artist Peter Piller at Andrew Kreps gallery.
lead_paragraph: Peter Piller’s two groups of pictures are pointedly parallel in juxtaposing iconographies of war and technology on the one hand and of feminine beauty and nature on the other.
